name: monogamously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves marriage to or a relationship with only one other person: I’ve been involved monogamously with my partner for 25 years. I'm a happily, monogamously married person. Compare
bigamously
biology
  specialized (of an animal) in a way that involves having only one mate (= sexual partner) at a time: These birds mate monogamously and for life. The pair's territory was defended by a monogamously mated male.
More examplesFewer examplesMost young people in that society start married life monogamously.The study compared polygamously and monogamously married individuals.The females that paired monogamously with a male got more help with rearing the chicks.These females typically lay fewer eggs than monogamously mated ones.
